channel.title: Notes on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Table of Content for terlampau dot top youtube
item.description: PDF / ebook reader gratis dengan fitur terbanyak | review okular - YouTube

item.title: Keybindings
item.description: I will add TOC (table of content) when this notes became too long. Some application have a lot more than what I shown here, but most of keybind that I shown here is keybind that I always use most of the time. Okular Action Keybind Remap keybind C-A-, Double page view (facing page) C-S-2 Single page view C-S-1 Toggle sidebar F7 Jump to specific page C-g Fullscreen mode F11 Presentation mode C-S-p Annotation 123456 Cursor to browse C-1 Cursor to text selection C-4 Trim margin

item.title: Projects Live
item.description: List of projects that live and still maintained by me. clock-in-task-fyne Desktop app built with go using fyne-toolkit. This desktop app will sync with current task that running in org-pomodoro within emacs application. It will show total minutes that I working on this, effort estimation in minutes and task title. emacs already have builtin taskbar that show total minutes clocked, effort estimation and task title with remaining time. but it only show when emacs opened, most of the time I want to know the pomodoro timer everywhere.

item.title: Software That I Use
item.description: In an attempt to documentice what software I’m using. I will update this as the time goes on. The order is on alphabetically basis. Linux Emacs - Notes MarkText - Markdown editor with styles Nvim - Text editor
